name: Gator's Story
description:
This is a short prototype for a game I could fully create in the future. It features the alligator (the player) in a battle against the enemy, Myra the Fallen. The battle is currently a defense system, where the way you defeat Myra is by dodging all of his attacks. There is not much for the game right now, but more could be added later. 

Also I could not figure out a way to have the battle start after the 4th text box, so once you collide with Myra, wait about 25 seconds and the battle will begin. Sorry about that!
